messages.content: can you draw a christmas gift i got my mother in law an iphone and hid it in a chocolate box as a suprise and i want to make an image representing it

{"prompt":"A creative Christmas gift presentation showing an opened chocolate box with assorted chocolates and an iPhone hidden inside as a surprise. The box is festive, decorated with red and green ribbons, surrounded by holiday decorations like ornaments, snowflakes, and candy canes. The setting is cozy, with soft lighting and a Christmas tree in the background.","size":"1024x1024"}
